uniequip_003_lmlee.name: Kindness Begets Prosperity

uniequip_003_billro.name: Poised for Action
uniequip_003_billro.EN: Improves own SP recovery rate by +0.6/second when SP is above the limit
uniequip_003_billro.CN: 技力超过上限时，技力自然回复速度+0.6/秒
uniequip_003_billro.mod: 技力超过上限时，技力自然回复速度+0.8/秒；蓄力状态开启技能时，更不容易受到敌人攻击

uniequip_003_billro.name: Poised for Action
uniequip_003_billro.EN: Improves own SP recovery rate by +0.6/second when SP is above the limit
uniequip_003_billro.CN: 技力超过上限时，技力自然回复速度+0.6/秒
uniequip_003_billro.mod: 技力超过上限时，技力自然回复速度+1.0/秒；蓄力状态开启技能时，更不容易受到敌人攻击

uniequip_003_weedy.name: Industrial Water Cannon
uniequip_003_weedy.EN: Can deploy a Reserve Water Cannon that lasts for 20s; the Water Cannon can attack 1 target and push it away slightly
uniequip_003_weedy.CN: 可以使用一个持续20秒的蓄水炮，能攻击单个敌人并将其小力度地推开
uniequip_003_weedy.mod: 可以使用一个持续20秒的蓄水炮，能攻击单个敌人并将其小力度地推开，蓄水炮的再部署时间减少5秒

uniequip_003_weedy.name: Industrial Water Cannon
uniequip_003_weedy.EN: Can deploy a Reserve Water Cannon that lasts for 20s; the Water Cannon can attack 1 target and push it away slightly
uniequip_003_weedy.CN: 可以使用一个持续20秒的蓄水炮，能攻击单个敌人并将其小力度地推开
uniequip_003_weedy.mod: 可以使用一个持续20秒的蓄水炮，能攻击单个敌人并将其小力度地推开，蓄水炮的再部署时间减少8秒
